name: Space Navigation and Communication
description: Introduction to communication systems and navigation tools used in space.

lessons.name: Space Navigation I
lessons.description: Space navigation involves techniques and tools to accurately determine the position of spacecraft and plan its trajectory.

lessons.name: Space Communication I
lessons.description: Understanding the basics of communication between Earth stations and spacecraft, including satellites and deep space probes.

name: Astrophysics and Cosmology
description: Dive deep into the universe, its phenomena, and origins.

lessons.name: Basics of Astrophysics
lessons.description: A study on stars, galaxies, black holes, and the overall structure of the universe.

lessons.name: Cosmology Concepts
lessons.description: Exploring the origins, development, and fate of the universe.

name: Planetary Science and Exploration
description: Study of planets, including their composition and internal structure.

lessons.name: Planetary Formation
lessons.description: Understanding the processes leading to the formation of planets and other celestial bodies.

lessons.name: Exploring Exoplanets
lessons.description: Discovering planets outside our solar system and the potential for life.

name: Rocket Staging and Sequencing
description: Study of multi-stage rockets and the process of staging.

lessons.name: Staging Dynamics
lessons.description: How multi-stage rockets optimize their payload delivery to space.

lessons.name: Sequencing Systems
lessons.description: Mechanisms and control systems that manage the release and ignition of each stage.

name: Space Mission Design
description: Principles behind designing space missions for various objectives.

lessons.name: Mission Objectives and Planning
lessons.description: Setting goals for space missions and creating a roadmap for achieving them.

lessons.name: Risk Management in Space Missions
lessons.description: Identifying, assessing, and mitigating potential risks in space missions.

name: Advanced Propulsion Systems
description: Exploration of new-age propulsion systems beyond chemical rockets.

lessons.name: Nuclear Propulsion
lessons.description: Using nuclear reactions to achieve higher thrust and efficiency.

lessons.name: Ionic and Electric Propulsion
lessons.description: Understanding propulsion systems that use electric or magnetic fields to generate thrust.

name: Astrobiology and Search for Extraterrestrial Life
description: Study of life in the universe and the conditions required for its existence.

lessons.name: Origins of Life
lessons.description: Exploring theories and evidences regarding the beginning of life on Earth.

lessons.name: Extraterrestrial Habitats
lessons.description: Identifying celestial bodies with the potential to host life and the methods to detect it.

name: Advanced Spacecraft Design
description: In-depth study of spacecraft design including advanced systems and technologies.

lessons.name: Spacecraft Automation and Robotics
lessons.description: Use of robotics and automated systems in spacecraft for exploration and operations.

lessons.name: Spacecraft Material Science
lessons.description: Selection and optimization of materials for spacecraft to withstand the harsh space environment.

name: Space Policy and Ethics
description: Discussion on policies governing space activities and the ethical considerations.

lessons.name: International Space Treaties
lessons.description: Understanding international agreements and regulations related to space exploration and use.

lessons.name: Ethical Considerations in Space Exploration
lessons.description: Addressing the moral implications of exploring and potentially colonizing other planets.

name: LandRover Design
description: Introduction to LandRover design principles and methodologies.

lessons.name: LandRover Design Basics
lessons.description: Understanding the foundational concepts behind the iconic LandRover designs.

lessons.name: Advanced LandRover Design Techniques
lessons.description: Exploring advanced techniques and principles used in LandRover vehicle designs.

name: PSLV Launch Vehicles
description: Introduction to the design, functioning, and launch procedures of PSLV.

lessons.name: Basics of PSLV
lessons.description: Overview of the PSLV launch vehicle, its components, and its history.

lessons.name: Advanced PSLV Launch Procedures
lessons.description: Detailed exploration of the launch procedures and techniques employed in PSLV missions.

name: Seminar on GSLV
description: Introduction to GSLV rockets, their designs, and launch procedures.

lessons.name: GSLV Basics
lessons.description: Understanding the foundational concepts behind GSLV rockets and their launches.

lessons.name: Advanced GSLV Techniques
lessons.description: Delving into the intricacies and advanced methodologies used in GSLV missions.
